name: graphics
description: The Graphics module provides a JavaScript API for creating shapes in a variety of formats across all A-grade browsers.
author: tripp

examples.name: graphics-simple
examples.description: Shows how to create a Graphic instance and add shapes.

examples.name: graphics-path
examples.description: Shows how to draw lines and polygons.

examples.name: graphics-gradients
examples.description: Shows how to create linear and radial gradient fills.

examples.name: graphics-drag
examples.description: Shows how to add drag to a shape.

examples.name: graphics-transforms
examples.description: Shows how to apply transforms to shape.

examples.name: graphics-customshape
examples.description: Shows how to use a custom shape with the Graphics module.

examples.name: graphics-muddyglass
examples.description: Shows to use the graphics api to draw a realistic glass.

examples.name: graphics-violin
examples.description: Shows to use the graphics api to draw a violin.
